entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 08:18 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.2°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
